dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Ah, you're back! I'd love to chat a bit more, but I've got paperwork to fix... Perhaps some other time?

dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hello there! I'm {npc.name}, the dockmaster. You must be new around here, for I do not recognize you. Are you the adventurer Sam Goodberry spoke of?

dialog.name: yes
dialog.message: Hmm! Sam is a good friend of mine, and a great captain. Shame about what happened to you - from what I gather, you hit your head while on the sea in that storm?

dialog.name: eryes
dialog.message: Must have been painful, that! How's your memory doing?

dialog.name: nocomment
dialog.message: Hmm... well... at any rate, what is the reason behind your visit?

response.message: Sam mentioned you might have a spare map of Incuna?
Sam mentioned you might have a spare map of Incuna?

dialog.name: map
dialog.message: I do indeed - I have several spare maps here in fact. Since you're new around here, it is only proper I should give you one. Here you go...
{npc.name} gives you a map of Incuna.
